page.title: 17GAMES TO PLAY IN LONGNEWTON
page.content: MY FAVOURITE GAME IS{HIDE AND SEEK. FIRST DECIDE WHO IS GOING TO COUNT. WHILE THE PERSON IS COUNTING THE REST MUST{RUN AWAY}AND HIDE.WHEN THE PERSON WHO IS COUNTING HAS FINISHED HE/SHE MUST GO AND{LOOK}FOR THE OTHERS.THE FIRST PERSON TO BE FOUND MUST COUNT FOR THE NEXT GAME. YOU CAN PLAY{LEAPFROG}WITH AS MANY PEOPLE AS YOU LIKE.ONE OF YOU BENDS DOWN WITH YOUR HANDS ON YOUR ANKLES. THE OTHERS{JUMP OVER YOU}BY GETTING THEIR HANDS ON YOUR BACK.THERE IS A ROW OF PEOPLE AND YOU JUMP UNTIL YOU FINISH THE ROW. TO PLAY{MAY-I}YOU CAN HAVE AS MANY PEOPLE AS YOU WANT.ONE PERSON IS ON AND ALL THE REST STAND IN A LINE.THE PERSON WHO IS ON SAYS{e.g DO A BABY {STEP}OR OTHER SIMILAR INSTRUCTIONS AND YOU DO IT UNTIL SOMEONE HAS TOUCHED THE PERSON WHO IS ON.
